Name: cortisone reductase deficiency 2
Definition: A cortisone reductase deficiency that is characterized by a failure to regenerate cortisol via the enzyme 11-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase

Name: cortisone reductase deficiency 1
Definition: A cortisone reductase deficiency that is characterized by failure to regenerate cortisol via the enzyme 11-beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase which requires NADPH regeneration by hexose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase
